CSSTransform-functionPerspective.summary:
The perspective() CSS function defines a transformation that sets the distance between the
user and the z=0 plane, the perspective from which the viewer would be if the 2-dimensional interface were
3-dimensional. Its result is a {{cssxref("<transform-function>")}} data type.

remarks.para:
The perspective() transform function is part of the 'transform' value applied on the
element being transformed. This differs from the 'perspective' and 'perspective-origin'
properties which are attached to the parent of a child transformed in 3-dimensional space.
